message:
I've been writing socket code for so many years, I even came across delimiter based data when connecting to Asterisk PBX via AMI socket interface. But I never paid attention to the concept of reading/writing streams instead of packets. My bad.

I've even created a course on TCP/IP socket programming which is doing pretty good, here's the link

[https://www.udemy.com/tcpip...](https://www.udemy.com/tcpip-socket-programming-for-coders-using-csharp-net/ "https://www.udemy.com/tcpip-socket-programming-for-coders-using-csharp-net/")

I've added link to this page in course discussions section so that students will know.
